mapper.select: SELECT rn, noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeContents, noticeDate, noticeHits FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY noticeNo DESC) AS rn, noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeContents, noticeDate, noticeHits FROM NOTICE ) AS derived WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (noticeTitle, noticeContents, noticeDate, noticeHits,memberNo) VALUES (#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContents},now(),0,1)
